name: Camtasia Studio Screen Recording
summary: A CAMREC file is a recording of live events on a computer screen captured by TechSmith Camtasia (version 8.3 and earlier). It is similar to a screenshot but is a video recording that may include both video and audio, instead of a still image. CAMREC files are often used for creating program demos, computer training videos, and other types of presentations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
